text: Le Day railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Vallorbe, in the Swiss canton of Vaud. It sits at the junction of the standard gauge Simplon line of Swiss Federal Railways and Pont–Vallorbe line of Travys. It is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at Le Day: * RER Vaud: ** : hourly service between and ; one daily round-trip continues from Villeneuve to . ** : rush-hour service between Lausanne and via Vallorbe. * Travys: hourly service between Vallorbe and Le Brassus. == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Vaud Category:Swiss Federal Railways stations
title: Le Day railway station
